assessments.status_rationale: No reporting on the August ISM Services Prices Paid index in today's news; release window not yet closed.
Performance window runs through 2025-09-30 and no comparative RSP vs. SPY data was provided in today's news.
No evidence on USD/CNH reaching 7.45; coverage did not include FX levels and the deadline is 2025-09-30.
No initial jobless claims figures for the week ending 2025-09-06 were reported; official release due 2025-09-11.
No EIA crude inventory data for the week ending 2025-09-06 in today's news; report due 2025-09-11.
No mention of the 5y5y forward inflation rate reaching 2.25% or below; deadline is end of September.
No JOLTS July 2025 figure reported; release expected imminently but not covered in today's bullets.
